00047 #include "nut_io.h"
00048 
00049 #include <sys/nutdebug.h>
00050 #include <io.h>
00051 
00056 
00073 size_t fwrite_P(PGM_P data, size_t size, size_t count, FILE * stream)
00074 {
00075     size_t rc;
00076 
00077     NUTASSERT(stream != NULL);
00078     if (size > 1)
00079         count *= size;
00080     if ((int) (rc = (size_t) _write_P(stream->iob_fd, data, count)) <= 0)
00081         return 0;
00082     if (size > 1)
00083         rc /= size;
00084 
00085     return rc;
00086 }
